casebody.data:
GEORGE F. JOHNSON, Plaintiff and Respondent, v. JOSEPH PHILIPS, et al., Defendants and Appellants. Decided June 25, 1877.

Before Speir and Freedman, JJ.

*547Appeal from judgment entered upon verdict for plaintiff directed by court, and from order denying motion for new trial. The case involves only questions of fact. J. H. Whitlegge, for appellants Benjamin Merritt, for respondents. Speir, J.,

wrote for affirmance with costs.

Freedman, J., concurred.
